errors.error_description: The setup instructions omit the step of installing dependencies from a requirements file, incorrectly suggesting manual installation of a few packages.
correction_candidates: This will create a virtual environment, install requirements and set up git hooks.
This will create a virtual environment, install requirements from `requirements.txt` and set up git hooks.
Run `pip install -e .` after running the script to install all necessary dependencies.
This will create a virtual environment and set up git hooks. Then run `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
errors.golden_answer: This will create a virtual environment, install requirements and set up git hooks.
